H0.text: Which mountain range extends almost the length of Italy. Alps

H1.text: Which mountain range extends almost the length of Italy. Carpathian Mountains

H2.text: Which mountain range extends almost the length of Italy. Dinaric Alps

H3.text: Which mountain range extends almost the length of Italy. Appennin

A4.text: The Apennines extend approximately 1,200 km (750 mi) the length of peninsular Italy.

A5.text: Since 2000, the Apennines System has been defined to include mountains of north Sicily, totaling 1,500 kilometres (930 mi).
